General.Name: Kee Tai Properties Co Ltd
General.Description: Kee Tai Properties Co., Ltd. engages in construction activities in Taiwan. The company constructs and sells residential buildings, fine residences, office and commercial buildings, etc.; and leases and sells residential and commercial buildings. It is also involved in the clearance of construction waste. Kee Tai Properties Co., Ltd. was incorporated in the 1979 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1.Name: Mr. Chia-Cheng  Lin
1.Title: Mang. of Accounting Services Department, Head of Fin. & Head of Corp. Governance

2.Name: Mr. Tzu  Cheng
2.Title: Mang. of the Office of Legal Affairs
